high_descs: Turn right and walk to the toilet.
Pick up the roll of toilet paper from the top of the toilet.
Walk to the empty toilet paper holder on the right side of the toilet.
Put the roll of toilet paper on the empty toilet paper holder.
anns.task_desc: Place a full roll of toilet paper on an empty toilet paper holder.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the toilet.
Pick up the toilet paper, on the tank of the toilet, above the handle.
Move to your right so that you are in front of the toilet paper holder, between the toilet and the door.
Put the toilet paper on the toilet paper dispenser, hanging from the wall.
anns.task_desc: Put a roll of toilet paper on the toilet paper dispenser.

high_descs: take a few steps and turn to the right and go the front of the toilet and turn to the right facing the toilet
take the roll of toilet paper from the toilet tank
turn to the right and take a few steps and turn to the left and go to the toilet paper holder
put the roll of toilet paper on the toilet paper holder
anns.task_desc: Place a roll of toilet paper on a toilet paper holder
